name: Mi Nhon Em Hotel Muine
address: 202 Nguyễn Đình Chiểu Kp 2, Ham Tien Village, Mũi Né, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở Mũi Né, cách Bãi biển Hàm Tiến chỉ vài bước chân, Mi Nhon Em Hotel Muine cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có xe đạp miễn phí, chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí, hồ bơi ngoài trời và khu vườn. Ngoài Wi-Fi miễn phí, khách sạn 2 sao này còn cung cấp sân hiên và nhà hàng. Chỗ nghỉ này cung cấp dịch vụ phòng, bàn bán tour và dịch vụ thu đổi ngoại tệ cho khách.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần khách sạn bao gồm Suối Tiên, Chợ Rạng và Rang Church. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Liên Khương, cách Mi Nhon Em Hotel Muine 130 km, đồng thời chỗ nghỉ này cũng cung cấp dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay mất phí.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có 2 Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Super sauber, Zimmer wie auf den Bildern, was selten ist für Asien. Ein kleines Juwel. 100% Empfehlung. 
Der Strand vor der Tür ist eine Promenade. Zum Strand muss man laufen / fahren. Die Unterkunft bietet kostenlose Fahrräder, was super ist.

review.rating: 어린이 동반 가정에 강추! 아니 모두에게 강추!!

review.comment_positive:
보케거리와 조금 거리가 있지만 조용하고 가격에 비해 너무 훌륭한 숙소입니다!!!! 가족단위는 무조건 여기 추천해요!!!!! 방안에서 아이들 노는거 다 보이고 물도 깨끗!! 시설도 깨끗!! 숙소에서 먹는 반세오랑 쌀국수는 정말 ㅎㅎㅎㅎㅎ 가격도 착한데 맛도 너무 좋고 물놀이 하며 식사하기 최고입니다!!!!!!!!!!! 수심이 꽤깊어요! 163제키에 어깨쪽옵니다! 어린이들은 제가산 저 튜브 강추!!!!
이숙소를 무조건 추천합니다. 그리고 정말 친절해요

review.comment_positive: Het zwembad was lekker en de bedden comfortabel
review.comment_negative: Het personeel was niet vriendelijk, alles bij het hotel was overpriced. Mijn rok was 10cm korter na het gebruik van de wasservice, en het was vrij prijzig dus dit kan je beter ergens anders laten doen. We huurden scooters (achteraf was dit op andere plekken veel goedkoper), en deze kwamen met een flinke gebruiksaanwijzing, de 1 had geen licht & de ander startte vaak niet. Het eten bij het hotel was duur & achteraf moesten we nog 15K dong betalen omdat we de fles water die op het aanrecht stond ophadden. Als we hadden geweten dat we hier geld voor moesten betalen hadden we zelf ons flesje wel gevuld. Je kamer werd tussendoor niet schoongemaakt (de 1e dag gaven we aan dat dit niet hoefde, maar de overige dagen was dit wel heel fijn geweest). Overall, geen aangename ervaring.

review.rating: If you have the opportunity, you can experience Mi Nhon Em to feel the good things that come to mind.
review.room_type: Phòng 4 Người Tiện nghi
review.comment_positive:
This is my favorite hotel in Mũi Né is a coastal fishing town in the south-central Binh Thuan Province of Vietnam. The hotel is very spacious with main color is vintage. As a hotel in the garden, the space here is designed in harmony with nature. The large communal yard gives you space to relax and enjoy the view. Each room has basic equipment such as television, air conditioner, refrigerator, hair dryer, … The space at the hotel is extremely clean, quiet and cool. When you book a room, you can also enjoy access to outdoor swimming pool and hotel have serving breakfast, coffee or some juice (have fee) if you need.
The service attitude of the reception or any of the hotel’s staff is also extremely professional, making customers feel comfortable. If you have the opportunity, you can experience Mi Nhon Em to feel the good things that come to mind.

review.rating: A Memorable and Relaxing Stay at the Hidden Gem Mi Nhon Em Hotel Muine
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Cho 4 Người
review.comment_positive:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Mi Nhon Em Hotel Muine, and I must say that it was a truly exceptional experience. From the moment I arrived, the staff went above and beyond to make me feel welcome and comfortable. They were always friendly, helpful, and eager to assist with any request I had, which made me feel right at home.

The room was beyond my expectations, it was spacious, clean, and beautifully decorated. The facilities were top-notch, and everything was well-maintained. The comfort of the room was outstanding, and I enjoyed my stay in the hotel very much.

The value for money was impressive, as the hotel offers a great deal of luxury and comfort for a very reasonable price. The location is also fantastic, situated in a quiet area of Mui Ne, away from the hustle and bustle of the main street, yet close enough to be able to enjoy everything the town has to offer.

The spa experience was simply divine, and I highly recommend treating yourself to an indulgent massage during your stay. The staff at the spa were incredibly skilled and professional, and I left feeling completely rejuvenated.

But perhaps the highlight of my stay was the delightful vegetarian menu that the hotel offers. I particularly enjoyed the curry, fresh spring rolls, and coconut smoothie, which were all delicious and made with the freshest ingredients. The hotel's commitment to providing vegetarian options was impressive, and it made my stay all the more enjoyable.

Overall, the Mi Nhon Em Hotel Mui Ne is a hidden gem that should be discovered by anyone visiting Mui Ne. With its exceptional staff, luxurious rooms, top-notch facilities, great value, fantastic location, indulgent spa, and delicious vegetarian menu, it truly has everything you need for a memorable and relaxing stay.

review.comment_positive:
Замечательный отель на тихой улочке недалеко от пляжа. 
Останавливались на 3 дня перед отъездом домой. Если бы позволяло время, со спокойной душой остались бы там подольше. 
В отеле есть возможность заказать еду. Очень вкусно и по приятным ценам.
Отдельную благодарность хочу выразить персоналу отеля. Так получилось, что мы попали в небольшое ДТП. Нужна была экстренная медицинская помощь. Девочки отвезли в ближайшую клинику, помогли общаться с персоналом клиники, и в конце еще и помогли заплатить за лечение, так как у нас не было с собой наличных, а карту в клинике не приняли. 
Наличие бассейна изначально подкупило нас при выборе отеля и мы не пожалели.

Phòng Cổ Điển Cho 4 Người
review.comment_positive:
Чудесное место, домики удобные, просторные, кровати высокие и самый лучший матрас который я встречала во Вьетнаме- не жесткий и не мягкий, какой надо- высокий, плотный, шикарные одеяла и удобные подушки, постельное белье белоснежное и гладкое, это несомненно плюсы, которые не часто встречаются. 
Комната просторная, есть кухонный уголок с чайником, раковиной и холодильником, плитки для готовки нет( 
Территория красивая- ухоженная, милый чистый бассейн, но даль мне не удалось искупаться- были всего один день. 
Питание- на территории отеля кафе, очень вкусно и в принципе не дорого, можно даже никуда не ходить, тем питаться, брали суп Фо Бо- вкусный, блины тоже. 
Территория заслуживает отдельной оценки- она не большая, но очень уютная, красивейший сад, улочки, очень романтично) 
Единственный минус это пляж не так уж близко, и он не тот к которому привыкли мы, там нет песка, бетонная полоса уходит в море, это было единственным недостатком. 
А так отель милый.

review.comment_positive:
C'est un hôtel magnifique, il y a des plantes partout, il est situé a l'écart de tout et on y a passé un séjour très paisible.
La piscine est agréable et appréciable après une journée de chaleur intense ! 
Toutes les femmes y travaillant sont adorables, serviables, souriantes...mêmes celles ne parlant que Viet Namien ont été d'une gentillesse extrême avec nous.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có 2 Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very charming place with a nice pool, big and clean rooms. Beds are very comfortable, spacious bathroom, many towels, other ammenities. In overall we liked everything! Kitchen is open from 8am - 9pm, food and drinks at a very good price and few steps away from pool! Highly recommend! Girls at reception are very helpful and smiling, booked the bus tickets for us, answered all questions. Sea is few steps away, in the morning you can follow the fisherman's life, in the evening you enjoy bars and music. Local market and church is very close as well as small shops and local food places.
review.comment_negative: The atmosphere is very nice, but depends a lot on people staying around. Because the place is very cosy and you are like a big family. On the second day of our stay a big local family arrived (up to 10 persons with kids) and the paradise has ended with crying, screaming, making chaos in the pool. It was a bit sad.

review.comment_positive: The staff were super friendly and very helpful. On the morning of, they called me to instruct me where to get off and how to get to the hotel. They also told me to call them if I can’t find the place. The room was a standard hotel room. It was kept very clean. The cleaning crew works very efficiently. On the first day, I noticed there was sand on my bed so I reported it to them the next morning and it was addressed immediately. We ordered some food for lunch and it was good. The hotel is 5 mins walk to the beach which is very convenient. There are restaurants, stores and markets nearby. The hotel is decorated with a lot of greens. The only one minus thing is wifi is not as strong in my room. Since I worked a lot in my room, it was quite disruptive. However, I really enjoyed my stay. Highly recommended and will definitely stay here again when I come to Mũi Né.

Der Pool ist großartig. Die Lage des Hotels ist absolut ruhig und es sind nur ein paar Meter bis zum Meer. There were some strange-looking wooden things which looked like easels. (uncomfortable). It was also between other rooms which felt as though I was intruding if I used it.
There were no sockets near the bed and no switch for the main light. (even though it states that there are in the room description) The bed was positioned in the middle of the room with just a narrow way to walk past it (pic 2). The kitchen had a kettle but no cups and no tea/coffee sachets.
The windows were glazed with glass that could not be seen through (pic 3) and set in flimsy aluminium frames. The door could be pulled open by a few centimetres which did not feel safe (pic 1)

review.comment_positive: Alles war perfekt! Uns wurde bei allem geholfen. Wir haben ein Zimmerupgrade bekommen und alles war sauber hell und neu. Der Pool ist der schönste in der Gegend (verglichen mit den umliegenden Hostels) es gibt einen Wasserspender und gratis Fahrräder. Die angebotenen Touren haben den marktüblichen Preis also sehr fair. Wir würden am letzten Tag sogar zum Bus gebracht :)

Amazing place, friendly staff, and one of the best feelings of relaxation we had in Vietnam.
The food on the premises was amazing and the pool very well maintained.

review.comment_positive: Mooie en rustige accommodatie in rustig gedeelte buiten de stad, 10 minuutjes tot het centrum en taxi's (via Grab of via hotel) altijd beschikbaar. Vriendelijke personeel. Schone kamers. Heerlijk zwembad.
review.comment_negative: Er was iets niet goed gegaan met de booking, ik had 3 nachten geboekt maar er waren nog enkel 2 nachten beschikbaar. Ze hadden voor de derde nacht een ander hotel geregeld dat dichtbij lag en absoluut niet minder goed was :). In het weekend zijn er meer ontbijtopties dan door de week.

review.rating: Excellent value for money and fantastic place to stay. No complaints
review.room_type: Phòng 4 Người Tiện nghi
review.comment_positive: Very comfortable beds. Lovely bathroom and shower . Mini fridge in room. TV has Netflix also . Pool is lovely too and plenty of food options to order . Excellent value for money . Somewhere to refill water , free bike rental and friendly staff .

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Kostenloses Upgrade in ein grösseres Zimmer. Als wir am Abend angekommen sind, war aber das Zimmer ausversehen nicht bereit gemacht worden. Konnten aber im Restaurant gegenüber direkt Essen gehen und bekamen für die Wartezeit noch ein Getränk kostenlos. Schöner Pool. Genügend Platz um die Roller zu parkieren. Sehr grosses Badezimmer.
